Hey there! This is XuHao, an engineer born in the late ’80s. I call Chengdu my home and have a keen interest in machine learning, data science and programming. I especially love drawing inspiration from everyday life and jot down my insights right here, feel free to drop by, chat, and even correct me if you see fit!ğŸ˜‰
